message: Rego's temporarily offline while we deal with PayPal silliness. Hopefully we can get it back up ASAP.
Still working with PayPal trying to get things going....
Any idea when this will be resolved?  I ask because of the email that went around on the mailing list about deadlines for shirts being this week.
We're working with PayPal as quickly as we can - unfortunately we're now in our fourth round of "just supply this documentation and we'll unlock your account"...
Woohoo! PayPayl unlocked our account! Registration is now open again!
